text: Notoficula is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Eratoidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Notoficula include: * Notoficula bouveti (Thiele, 1912) * Notoficula otagoensis Dell, 1962 * Notoficula signeyensis Oliver, 1983 ;Species brought into synonymy: * Notoficula problematica Powell, 1951: synonym of Parficulina problematica(Powell, 1951) ==References== * Oliver, P.G. (1983). Notoficula Thiele, a neotenous genus of eratoid gastropod from Antarctica. Br. Antarct. Surv. Bull 61: 1-6 ==External links== Category:Eratoidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Notoficula
